actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.

committees.committee: Senate Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs

official_title: A bill to require senior officials to report payments received from the Federal Government and to improve the filing and disclosure of financial disclosures by Members of Congress, congressional staff, and very senior employees.
subjects: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management
Government ethics and transparency, public corruption
Presidents and presidential powers, Vice Presidents

titles.title: A bill to require senior officials to report payments received from the Federal Government and to improve the filing and disclosure of financial disclosures by Members of Congress, congressional staff, and very senior employees.
